title: Ride or Die + TNF Preview, Tom’s T-Shirt - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/5
description:
Get ready for Week 5! On today’s fantasy football podcast, we discuss Tom Brady’s mysterious t-shirt and other players to monitor this week. Plus a preview of Thursday Night Football between the Colts and the Broncos and a new edition of “Ride or Die!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 5th, 2022.

Connect with the show:

Studio is brought to you by Samsung Galaxy. Visit samsung.com to learn more.

Ride or Die presented by Chevrolet. Visit Chevy.com
